tool_description: This API checks for any signs of tampering on Indian PAN cards.
name: PAN Tampering
title: PAN Tampering

api_list.name: PAN Tamapering
api_list.description: This API checks for any signs of tampering on Indian PAN cards
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pan-tampering.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/tampering/ind_pan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pan-tampering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pan-tampering.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/tampering/ind_pan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pan-tampering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
